attributes.action: Bring British Sign Langauge into the National Curriculum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see British Sign Language in the National Curriculum, as it allows the deaf community to intergrate with those of us who can hear. They're deaf not stupid, so let them be apart of our community. French and German are taught in schools so why not British Sign Language?
